PROMOTION_NOT_AVAILABLE_ON_PLATFORM: Promotion not available on this platform
PROMOTION_FOR_NEW_USERS_ONLY: This promotion is for new users only
PROMOTION_FOR_FIRST_LOGIN_ONLY: This promotion is for first-time login only
MINIMUM_ORDER_COUNT_NOT_MET: Minimum order count requirement not met
MAX_USES_FOR_PROMOTION_REACHED: You have reached the maximum uses for this promotion
MAX_USES_FOR_PROMO_CODE_REACHED: You have reached the maximum uses for this promo code
MINIMUM_PURCHASE_AMOUNT_NOT_MET: Minimum purchase amount requirement not met
PROMO_CODE_VALID: Promo code is valid and ready to use
UNABLE_TO_VALIDATE_PROMO_CODE: Unable to validate promo code at this time
REFERENCED_ENTITY_NOT_FOUND: Referenced {type} with id {id} does not exist
PROMOTION_MUST_TARGET_ENTITIES: Promotion must target at least one brand, category, or collection
NO_ELIGIBLE_ITEMS_IN_CART: Your cart does not contain any items eligible for this promotion
